name: Chickens On Steroids.
description:
You are a chicken on a chicken meat farm. 

All you know in life is to eat kibbles and lay eggs.

What will you do?

Sub To My YT for DevLogs and Tutorials:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6MSGUycqabCud_PQOExCrQ

~Game Play~

Walk around the map collecting kibbles, each kibble will allow you to create a egg, and the eggs will hatch to be chickens. Once you have enough chickens, sell them to a local butcher.

This may take a while to load.
